nodes.text: Easy Money is an adventure scenario written by Eric S. Trautmann and published in The Politics of Contraband, a West End Games supplement to Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. It was published in September 1992 and reprinted in Classic Adventures Volume 1, published in 1995.
The story is set in the New Republic era, but before the Thrawn campaign: between 5 ABY and 9 ABY.

A pair of smugglers undertake a delivery to the planet Seikosha for Simms Jonndril. The cargo, an R1-series astromech droid, contained information relating to a storehouse of the Emperor's hidden weapons. Several factions, including crime lords, the Galactic Empire, and the New Republic, sought to acquire the droid.
